Deutsch's Algorithm


17 Aug 2016
In this post I’ll present a quantum implementation of the Deutsch’s algorithm using a library QuantumComputingLib that I wrote this week. First, I should write a little about the library. It’s version 1.0-SNAPSHOT only and it doesn’t have an official release version. For now, it only has a basic Javadoc and only provides methods for well-known operations on qubits and matrices.
